Card.Description: Your internet broke! Move to the broken internet space. Do not pass go. Do not collect 24 hours.
You just bought a brand new Tempur-Pedic mattress! Gain 8 hours of sleep.
You're favorite celebrity is doing an AMA! Lost 5 hours of sleep.
It's the weekend! Gain 10 hours of sleep.
You stay up all night after submitting a link to see how it does! Lose 8 hours of sleep.
Advance to the nearest person space. If unowned, you may buy them. If owned, pay the owner the appropriate rent.
You got banned from your favorite subreddit! Gain 10 hours of sleep.
You submitted a link that was awful, and lose 8 hours of sleep.
You spend the night sifting through new posts. Lose 5 hours.
You just discovered /r/bestofnetflix. You stay up all night watching movies, lose 15 hours of sleep.
Become a moderator of a subreddit! Lose 10 hours of sleep.
Get caught redditing at work and fired! Collect 12 hours of sleep!
There doesn't seem to be anything here.
Power outage! Gain 12 hours of sleep.
